CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.4.k.5.4, drugintervaldosageunitnumber (3N)
E2B (R3): G.k.4.r.2 Number of Units in the Interval Conformance: Optional Data Type: 4N OID: None Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Example: 5 mg 2 times a day every other day for 30 days Dose (number): 5 Dose (unit): mg Interval: 2 Interval Unit: day Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (number): 150 Cumulative Dose to First Reaction (unit): mg
CustomField.label: Dosage Interval
